charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2) Felon in Possession of a Firearm(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 36 Months on Counts 1 and 2, with said terms to run concurrently; 3 Years Supervised Release on Counts 1 and 2, with said terms to run concurrently; $100 MSA on Counts 1 and 2 for a total MSA of $200.00

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) Possession with Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 36 Months on Counts 1 and 2, with said terms to run concurrently; 3 Years Supervised Release on Counts 1 and 2, with said terms to run concurrently; $100 MSA on Counts 1 and 2 for a total MSA of $200.00
